mapper.insert: insert into mainfeed (social_id, update_date,update_time,is_public,main_text,normal_tag,is_deleted, user_idx,emote_idx, emote_color_idx, feed_hit, file_idx, emote_complete_idx) values(#{socialId},curdate(), curtime(), #{isPublic},#{mainText}, #{normalTag},0, #{userIdx}, #{emoteIdx},#{emoteColorIdx},0, #{fileIdx}, #{emoteCompleteIdx})
insert into feedcalendar (calendar_date, emote_idx,user_idx, emote_complete_idx) values(curdate(), #{emoteIdx}, #{userIdx}, #{emoteCompleteIdx})
mapper.select: select f.feed_idx, u.nickname, f.update_date,f.emote_complete_idx,f.file_idx, (select count(*) from feedcomment c, mainfeed f where c.feed_idx= f.feed_idx and c.feed_idx=#{feedIdx})as 'comment_count', (select count(*) from feedlike l, mainfeed f where f.feed_idx=l.feed_idx and l.feed_idx=#{feedIdx} and l.like_type=1) as 'like_count', (select count(*) from feedlike l, mainfeed f where f.feed_idx=l.feed_idx and l.feed_idx=#{feedIdx} and l.like_type=2 ) as 'cheerup_count', (select count(*) from feedlike l, mainfeed f where f.feed_idx=l.feed_idx and l.feed_idx=#{feedIdx} and l.like_type=3) as 'sad_count', (select count(*) from feedlike l, mainfeed f where f.feed_idx=l.feed_idx and l.feed_idx=#{feedIdx} ) as 'like_total_count' from mainfeed f ,mainuser u where f.is_deleted!=1 and f.feed_idx=#{feedIdx} and f.user_idx=u.user_idx ;

select f.feed_idx,f.emote_complete_idx, f.file_idx,c.comment_count, l.like_total_count from ( select m.feed_idx, m.file_idx ,m.emote_complete_idx from mainfeed m, (select distinct target_user_idx from userfollow where userfollow.user_idx=#{userIdx} ) f where f.target_user_idx = m.user_idx and m.is_deleted !=1 and m.is_public !=0 ) f left join ( select feed_idx, count(*) as comment_count from feedcomment where is_deleted = 0 group by feed_idx ) as c on f.feed_idx = c.feed_idx left join ( select feed_idx, count(*) as like_total_count from feedlike group by feed_idx ) as l on f.feed_idx = l.feed_idx ;
